info.document: President of the United States, Donald Trump, Vice President of the United States Mike Pence, Senator Marco Rubio, Governor Rick Scott, and First Lady of the United States Melania Trump met with Maj. Gen. Michael Calhoun, The Adjutant General - Florida, Brig. Gen. Mike Canzoneri, Florida Assistant Adjutant General - Commander Florida Army National Guard, and Brig. Gen. Gordon Ellis, 38th Infantry Division Deputy Commanding General, among many other service members from all components on Sept. 14, 2017 at Fort Myers Airport to be briefed on the status of the Hurricane Irma relief efforts. (Photo by: Army National Guard Maj. Chris Matthews, Public Affairs Officer)
